name: political-productivity-hub
description: Political Productivity Hub - MVP for Messaging & Contact Core

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.typecheck:frontend: cd frontend && npm run typecheck || npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run install:all
scripts.setup:env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env') && fs.existsSync('.env.example')) fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env'); console.log('Environment setup complete!');"

author: Political Productivity Hub Team
